articles.title: New BMW M2 review with 0-60mph & auto vs manual! - carwow
articles.description: This is the all-new BMW M2! Mat’s headed over to America to get his hands on this all-new sports coupe, and he’s about to find out if it’s a worthy successor...

articles.title: NASA Chooses Indian American Amit Kshatriya to Head its Most Ambitious Space Exploration Program - American Kahani

articles.author: Sam Tonkin
articles.title: NASA will unveil its first moon crew in 50 years tomorrow - Daily Mail
articles.description: Three Americans and a Canadian will be revealed to the world on Monday (April 3) as they gear up to fly around our lunar satellite as part of the Artemis II mission scheduled for 2024.
articles.content: Fifty two years ago, David Bowie was headlining Glastonbury, Muhammad Ali and Joe Frazier traded blows in the 'Fight of the Century', and John Lennon left Britain for the final time before his murder… [+14406 chars]
